title: MCPConfiguration
description: This schema defines the Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server configuration

enabled.description: Enable or disable the MCP server

originValidationEnabled.description: Enable or disable origin validation for requests

originHeaderUri.description: Expected origin header URI for validation

baseUrl.description: Base URL for MCP OAuth endpoints. Used for OAuth metadata (issuer, endpoints). If not set, falls back to system settings. For clustered deployments, set this to the external-facing URL.

allowedOrigins.description: List of allowed origins for CORS on OAuth endpoints. Use specific origins for production security. Wildcard (*) is NOT recommended.

connectTimeout.description: HTTP connection timeout in milliseconds for SSO provider metadata fetching. Default: 30000ms (30 seconds)

readTimeout.description: HTTP read timeout in milliseconds for SSO provider metadata fetching. Default: 30000ms (30 seconds)
